alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 6:55PM MST until December 22 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected for the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
